articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Euro zone factory activity stuck in steep downturn - Reuters.com
articles.description: Euro zone manufacturing activity remained mired in a deep and broad-based downturn last month, according to a survey which showed on Monday that demand kept shrinking at a pace rarely surpassed since the data was first collected in 1997.
articles.content: LONDON, Oct 2 (Reuters) - Euro zone manufacturing activity remained mired in a deep and broad-based downturn last month, according to a survey which showed on Monday that demand kept shrinking at a p… [+1626 chars]

articles.title: Groningen gas field: A dangerous place to live - Euronews
articles.description: More than 3,000 homes have had to be demolished due to earthquake damage and from 2015, gas production has been scaled down.
articles.content:
More than 3,000 homes have had to be demolished due to earthquake damage and from 2015, gas production has been scaled down.
